mapper.insert: insert into evt_scene_serv_rel (SCENE_SERV_REL_ID, EVENT_SCENE_ID, SERVICE_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{sceneServRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eventSceneId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select SCENE_SERV_REL_ID, EVENT_SCENE_ID, SERVICE_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from evt_scene_serv_rel where SCENE_SERV_REL_ID = #{sceneServRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
